item.description:
Let's kick off summer with the band Good N Plentie @ Captian's Cove in Bridgeport Ct. http://www.captainsco...

This will be a multi group event!!!

One of Fairfield County's HOT SPOTS for top entertainment!

Come meet friends and have a drink at our tugboat bar....or sit on our deck overlooking Historic Black Rock Harbor!

Enjoy delectable clams and oysters at our Weekend Raw Bar! (open from Memorial Day to Labor Day)


This highly talented and experienced eight piece band, complete with lead front male & female vocalists, horn section and accomplished rhythm section delivers a first-class performance that makes Good and Plentie one of the most in-demand bands in the New York metro area. Check them out at http://www.goodandple...

group.name: PartyExpress !! Let's Get Together and have Fun!

item.name: Join us for a multi group event on the Boardwalk @ Captians's Cove
